<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Craft Philosopher's Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=127) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 81 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone. You learn the formula for the [philosopher’s stone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=133) and can add it to your formula book.
name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
